-1.title: Pilot
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Love In 500 Characters is a 25-minute edgy comedy/drama following the world of dating in your early 30s. After her six-year relationship ends badly, Kris Rossi leaves Los Angeles and returns to the home she grew up in. She is recovering with the help of two supportive brothers and a hilarious best friend, until the past comes knocking. She is now working with the same guy who is solely responsible for her entire torturous high school existence. Surely life would not guide her back to this idiot unless it was time for some revenge. Dating is a different world with the power of an app.
